phrases: I hear they are back.
What are you talking about?
The core members of Fairy Tail who disappeared seven years ago.
Not interested.
You cannot fool me, Rogue.
I remember how you looked up to Natsu-san.
That was a long time ago.
I admonish us all for our sins.
We, Zentopia, should repent for all of the mistakes we have made up to now
and begin walking upon a new path...
Only then may we purge our sins...
This is tiring...
What can you do?
The archbishop himself invited us.
Yeah, but what about everybody else?
As if they would come to a ceremony like this?
We Legionnaires...
In any case, the crisis is over.
Raise your heads.
We fought, but let that be water under the bridge.
Let us start afresh.
My gratitude knows no bounds.
And so...
Sabertooth!
The battle over the Infinity Clock was over
and the escaped members of Oracion Seis
had been returned to prison.
Also...
Did you hear?!
That puny guild was the because of all the trouble!
What a total nuisance!
I cannot even remember the name of that guild...
It is Fairy Tail!
And so, the brave actions of Natsu and the rest notwithstanding,
the guild's reputation continued to plummet.
I see.
Thank you.
Apparently, Neville's Celestial Spirit Wizards
have been awakened from the 100-year sleeping spell.
However, just as with Katja,
all of them have lost their magic power and are no longer Celestial Spirit Wizards.
What is this?!
Just as it says in the report.
They are as they were seven years ago, back home and as boisterous as ever.
Well, so boisterous that the Chairman is miffed about it.
You...
You knew about this...?
It would have been easy for me to tell you, but...
No, it is fine.
I see...
They are alive...
And now, to celebrate the successful conclusion of the latest crisis,
an eating contest between Natsu and Dan... begin!
I am fired up!
I am going to win this one!
He is as energetic as usual...
It feels like that Infinity Clock business happened ages ago...
Here!
What?!
That is what you get!
Huh?
Is not that against the rules?
Ah, we will allow it.
Just think, right about now, Master and Wakaba are listening to a sermon.
I do not know whether to say they are soft-hearted or just got the short end of the stick...
But that ceremony's a big deal to them, right?
So what is Legion doing here?
We are the same as you guys!
For us, this is also...
Escape!
In other words, we are playing hooky!
Are you sure that is okay?!
Do not you take advantage of the chaos here and rub up against Gray-sama!
Spicy...
These people are hard to talk to.
Pain in the ass...
So...
Is there something wrong?
I ask again...
Um... Uh...
I said something terrible to you that last time!
I said I hated cats... and...
Oh, it is fine.
Forget about it!
Besides, even though you are a different person, I was still able to meet Coco again.
That is more than I could have asked for.
Thank you.
Well, from here on out, let us be friends.
Actually...
Hold it right there.
Before you start talking,
would you have another bout with me?
Fine!
Come on!
Why?!
Is something wrong?
No.
It is fine.
Everything's fine.
That side of the room's kind of gloomy, huh?
Those two have not said a word to each other...
Give me a break.
That is no way to drink booze.
Huh?
Is it just my imagination?
They are smiling?
Our scrap left me numb.
I guess it is a wide world out there.
I never knew there were wizards like you...
It was motivation and the luck of the moment.
And there are a lot of other factors, too.
I do not know how it would turn out if we ever locked horns again.
You take a broad view of things.
I just live selfishly is all.
I wonder what they are talking about...
Never mind.
It is probably just dirty talk.
Huh?
Lu-pi's not here...
Were not you fixated on Angel last time?
Life is short, so it is a waste not to live it up with every chance you get.
Is that right?
Is this the one who falls in love at the drop of a hat?
Hey, do not tell me...
She is scary!
Help me, Er-pin!
Er... pin?
Scary...?
I am stayin' out of this.
I knew from the start how you felt about me.
Now, let us become a happy cou...
I can only take so much fickleness.
It is not like I did not warn you.
Okay!
Erza won with one blow!
That is the proper way to use the weapon that keeps evil at bay.
What are you doing out here by yourself?
There is something...
I do not understand.
After what I did to you,
how can you smile at me?
Well, that is all over.
And you Legionnaires were tricked, right?
So do not worry about it.
Before Zentopia took me in,
I would been tricked and used my whole life.
But everything changed once I got power.
If it was for the sake of Zentopia, which raised me to be a person with power,
I thought I would do anything.
Thinking that, I controlled people...
And it felt like I was getting revenge on the people who had used me long ago.
But in the end, I was only being used again...
We Legionnaires, His Grace, Rapowant, too...
And also...
It seems you have managed to cast off your hesitancy.
Your movements are quite agile today.
Yeah, but not agile enough to beat you.
Too bad, I wanted to beat you once in the end.
In the end?
Coco...
What is that?
I am holding something very heavy.
But...
Certainly, I have entrusted you with that golden seal.
But I am not...
Though I was mind-controlled through all of this,
the weakness of my own mind is partially to blame.
From here on out, Legion's mission is going to be a long, severe one.
Please make good use of that golden seal.
Be it ever so little, try to bring light to people's hearts...
Your words are more than we deserve.
Um, what should Gatman-chama do...?
We are responsible for sealing you away in that prison in the first place.
From now on, I would like you to use your magic to help rebuild the local parish.
I will do everything in my power!
By the way, there is one thing that is been bothering me...
What was it?
The puppets that Rapowant sent to every area...
We investigated closely and found out what he was up to...
Apparently, Rapowant had his eye on the Lobster family fortune, so he kept her at hand.
But, um, the official document showing she is a distant relative of the Heartfilia family...
That was a fake too, was not it?
Thank you.
I suspected as much...
But...
I am fine.
I feel a little lonely...
Friends...
Well, now that I am refreshed, here...
Let us make up.
Shake.
Okay, we will start as friends...
I do not think that line fits here...
We visited here today for one reason.
I realized.
To say goodbye...
Goodbye?!
In accordance with His Grace's instructions,
we Legionnaires are to seek out the scattered parts of the Infinity Clock in every region
and find a better way to seal them up.
That being said, until the parts accumulate magic power,
it will be impossible to locate them with magic.
This work is going to last each one of us a lifetime.
In all likelihood, this is the last time we will be able to meet.
Therefore...
What are you sayin'?!
It is boring to jump to that conclusion from the outset!
Exactly.
Coco...
Thank you for everything.
Mary, you stop by and hang out again too, okay?
Thank you!
Take care, Princess, everyone!
I promise to come back!
Bye!
Well, I will see you again, Aniki.
You can come over to challenge me to a fight anytime...
Sam.
Huh?
He has not called him that before...
Let us meet again somewhere.
I guess that includes you too, Sugar Boy.
Dan...
Learn how to stick with one person.
That is a hot message!
Thank you!
Well,'til we meet again!
It is been fun.
That is right, octopus man!
It almost slipped my mind!
Octopus man...
What is it?
Does not scowling all the time make you tired?
You oughta try a smile once in a while!
Now, now!
Well...
After all this time, it would be out of character...
He very rarely smiles.
If I can face my heart head on...
Was not that it, Coco?
I finally understand what you said that time.
Eww!
You can tell he is totally not used to doing that.
Byro-sama, that is actually scary!
What is that, you rascals?!
And with laughter in the air, they began their journey.
I am sure we will meet again sometime...
Master Org, thank you for your hard work at the Council meeting.
Mm.
Has the Guild Amity and Trade Treaty reform bill been decided on yet?
More importantly,
you have already heard, have not you?
About the return of Fairy Tail's main members...
For political reasons,
the chairman apparently intends to tie in the Infinity Clock and Oracion Seis affair
not with Zentopia but with their return...
But that is fine.
As long as the case is closed...
The magic world may be in for troubled times again.
What happened this time may only have been a harbinger.
It is been seven years since Acnologia and Zeref awoke...
I am sorry.
We still have not been able to find either one of them.
Perhaps we should augment the expeditionary force.
It is been too quiet these past seven years.
We are keeping an eye on Sabertooth's ascent,
but Tartaros has not made any noticeable moves
and the same goes for the remaining members of Grimoire Heart.
And we have no information on Zeref or Acnologia.
However, it is an eerie silence.
It is like an endless night.
Will it be sunrise soon?
Will it become a great dawn for the magic world?
And you think Fairy Tail will set it off?
I despised Fairy Tail before and here I am expecting something of them...
I must be getting old.
Sabertooth?
Sabertooth, as in the tigers with the saber-like canine teeth.
They have surpassed Pegasus and Lamia and are currently the strongest wizards' guild in Fiore.
Never heard of'them.
They had not made much of a splash seven years ago.
Then they have suddenly risen to prominence these past seven years, huh?
What did it was changing their guild master
and the induction of five extremely powerful wizards into their ranks.
Things can change that much with just five people?
They got some guts.
Incidentally, how is our guild ranked?
You are going to ask that?!
Wendy, there is no need to rub it in.
We are bottom-ranked.
We are a totally wimpy guild.
The weakest guild in Fiore.
I am sorry!
That is even better!
It is more fun!
I mean, right?!
Think of how much fun it is going to be climbin' to the top again!
I am fired up!
Yeesh...
I am no match for Natsu-nii.
You are right!
Yeah!
I am looking forward to it!
Hey, you guys...
Have you seen Gildarts?
What, do you get lonely when Papa's not around?
Idiot!
Sorry...
No, that is okay.
Do not worry about it.
She is consoling Gray-sama?!
Gildarts went with Master to the original Fairy Tail base of operations.
Alright!
Then I will go out on a job while I have the chance!
It is amazing how lovey-dovey Gildarts gets with Cana.
You fawn over Carla the same way...
And he is supposed to be the guild's strongest...
This is such an oddball guild.
Are you sure we can just go in here?
The building was repossessed, right?
We will get it back soon.
Anyway, I did not know about this...
A deep underground passage below the guild...
That is because I did not tell anybody about it.
And why is that?
Oh, you will understand when you see it.
Here we go...
W-What is this?!
Our guild's greatest secret.
Lumen Histoire...
What is this?!
What does it mean?!
Mavis wrote that this is Fairy Tail's true nature.
I-I cannot find the words...
I do not blame you.
When Purehito showed this to me,
words failed me as well.
Why is something like this below the guild?
And why show me?!
Because you are going to be the next Fairy Tail master...
Gildarts!
It is been too long, let us fight!
It is like Natsu is a bug that pesters people...
What the hell, Gildarts?
You are in a bad mood, huh?
Is that right?
I am always like this.
Really?!
Maybe...
This makes me feel nostalgic.
Seven years ago, I was like this tall.
You were a fan of Gajeel-san, remember?
Man, Gajeel-san was scary!
Do not let yourself be bound by the past, Sting.
They were not on the path we took.
Found'them!
Take this!
Eating... an arrow?!
Do not tell me he...
Huh?
Maybe I am rusty...
I missed.
I-It was you two?!
The Twin Dragons of Sabertooth...
White Dragon, Sting and Shadow Dragon, Rogue!
The Dragon Slayer duo!
Hey!
You are going to leave your friends here?
You suck!
What do you expect from a Dark Guild?
You blew things up really good again, huh, Sting-kun?
Lecter and Frosch, where were you guys?
Oh, just doing a little reconnoitering...
Y'know, the Fire Dragon, Iron Dragon, heck, even the Sky Dragon do not stand a chance.
You have got it going on, oh yeah!
Fro thinks so, too!
I know, right?
Sting-kun, you are the strongest Dragon Slayer, oh yeah!
The way I am now, I am positive I could beat Natsu-san.
Well, yeah, of course!
What do you say we challenge them, Rogue?
Not interested.
Fro neither.
Natsu, did you hear?
There is a festival to decide the 1 guild in Fiore!
The Grand Magic Games, right?
We are going to win for sure!
When even fighting Max is a hard battle...?
Are you going to be okay?
I will build myself up by the time the tournament starts!
I am fired up!
Next time: And So, We Aim for the Top!
What are you going to do if it is not a battle but a quiz that takes brains?
W-Well, I will get by somehow!
